title: How to Enable Legacy Microsoft Edge

steps.title: Open Registry Editor.
steps.content: Open Registry Editor. To do so, press âŠž Win + R and type regedit.exe .

steps.title: Expand \HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\.
steps.content: Expand \HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\. You will be creating a new registry key here.

steps.title: Create a new key.
steps.content: Create a new key. Name it "EdgeUpdate". This is the registry key that will be used to decide whether Legacy Microsoft Edge should remain enabled.

steps.title: Click on the newly created "EdgeUpdate" key.
steps.content: Click on the newly created "EdgeUpdate" key. You will also be creating a DWORD value.

steps.title: Create a new DWORD value.
steps.content: Create a new DWORD value. Name it "Allowsxs". This is the value that you will set to enable Legacy Microsoft Edge.

steps.title: Right-click and choose "Modify...".
steps.content: Right-click and choose "Modify...". You will need to set the DWORD value before restarting your computer.

steps.title: Set the value to "1".
steps.content: Set the value to "1". It does not matter what the base is, because 1 is the same in both hexadecimal and decimal. Then click on OK .

steps.title: Restart your computer.
steps.content: Restart your computer. After making changes to the registry, it is a good idea to restart your computer. This will confirm that you have applied any needed modifications.

steps.title: Go to https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/edge.
steps.content: Go to https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/edge . This is the official website for the new Microsoft Edge.

steps.title: Click on the download link in the center of the page.
steps.content: Click on the download link in the center of the page. Accept the terms of use.

steps.title: Locate and open "MicrosoftEdgeSetup.exe" in "Downloads".
steps.content: Locate and open "MicrosoftEdgeSetup.exe" in "Downloads". Enter your username and password if prompted and click on OK or Yes .

steps.title: Let the download proceed.
steps.content: Let the download proceed. It should take only a few minutes to download the new browser to your PC.

steps.title: Complete the initial setup.
steps.content: Complete the initial setup. After the installation is complete, you will be asked to sign in with a Microsoft account (if you have not already), enable sync, and choose a home/new tab page layout. You may also be prompted to reenable extensions.

steps.title: Open Microsoft Edge Legacy.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Edge Legacy. This app will be re-enabled after running the Edge installer again.
